arStrings.szText: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your Cold Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage and continuously {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"/Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
